donateExcerpt: We appreciate any support to help us improve this project.
donationContent: Big Dipper is always open sourced and free to use. Anyone can use it to monitor available Cosmos hub or zones, or port to your own chain built with Cosmos SDK. We welcome any support to help us improve this project.
hero: The private investment arm of Forbole to invest in promising crypto projects.
leftIntro: Centralized social networks generate income by infringing on the privacy of their users.
rightIntro: Centralized social networks censor users’ contents which are good for our community but bad for the centralized authority.
preferenceP: We will gradually rebalance our portfolio and then reinvest our capital gain and income from staking and liquidity provisioning to new projects.
teamP: The initial contributor of Desmos is Forbole, a renowned developer, validator and community builder in various blockchain ecosystems.
profileP: Manage your social identities in one decentralized place.
productP: To foster user-centric social media, we need to build a diversified and inclusive ecosystem. We have developed various arms and tools to achieve this.
intro: Since 2017, Forbole has become a renowned developer, contributor, staking service provider and investor in blockchain space.
portfolioP: Forbole Ventures participates in early-stage investments, staking and liquidity provisioning. Our early-stage investment portfolio includes :
